did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence, diaries, published materials, and visual materials documenting the career of the Reverend Henri R. Ferger.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, diaries, published materials, and visual materials documenting the career of the Reverend Henri R. Ferger as a missionary and educator with the Presbyterian Board of Foreign Missions in India. Includes photographs, 35mm slides, lantern slides, stereo slides, and 16mm films related to Ferger's work in India and travel to many other countries.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Presbyterian Church in the U.S.A. Board of Foreign Missions.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Henri R. Ferger papers, #6646. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
